select t1.user_acct as userAcct, t1.user_name as userName, t1.sex as sex, t1.phone as phone, t1.email as mail, t1.id_card as idCard from t_sys_user t1, t_sys_customer t2, t_store_info t3 where t1.user_id = t2.customer_id and t2.invitation_code = t3.invitation_code and t1.role = 4 and t3.manager_id = #{userId}
and t1.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and t1.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
order by t2.create_time desc

select user_acct as userAcct, user_name as userName, sex as sex, phone as phone, email as mail, id_card as idCard from t_sys_user where role = 4
and user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
order by create_time desc
